======Locks onslaught on server.======
= Description =

Locks the 'onslaught' mode, player can't off the 'onslaught' mode if enabled.

=====Important Note:=====

* Locks onslaught function as same as plugin 'asw-exec-skills.smx', NO this plugin in your server if enabled, otherwise, your server has onslaught problem
